Sentencas: The deposition of porous La1-xSrxMnO3 (LSM) perovskite cathode materials by conventional plasma spray has been a challenge because of the decomposition of perovskite materials to their suboxides at high temperature.
Titulo: Solution Precursor Plasma Spray of Porous La1-xSrxMnO3 Perovskite Coatings for SOFC Cathode Application

Sentencas: In this paper, the solution precursor plasma spraying (SPPS) process, in which solution precursors of the desired resultant materials are fed into a direct current plasma jet by atomizing gas, was used to simultaneously synthesize LSM perovskite and deposit porous cathode coatings.
Titulo: Solution Precursor Plasma Spray of Porous La1-xSrxMnO3 Perovskite Coatings for SOFC Cathode Application

Sentencas: The experimental results show that process parameters have a significant effect on the fabricated coatings.
Titulo: Solution Precursor Plasma Spray of Porous La1-xSrxMnO3 Perovskite Coatings for SOFC Cathode Application

Sentencas: The perovskite coatings consist of porous agglomerates of small particles with rounded features and local denser regions referred to as thick flakes.
Titulo: Solution Precursor Plasma Spray of Porous La1-xSrxMnO3 Perovskite Coatings for SOFC Cathode Application

Sentencas: The small particles and thick flakes were held together by the previously molten material.
Titulo: Solution Precursor Plasma Spray of Porous La1-xSrxMnO3 Perovskite Coatings for SOFC Cathode Application

Sentencas: There are two kinds of pores in the fabricated coatings: large pores located between the agglomerates and fine pores inside the agglomerates.
Titulo: Solution Precursor Plasma Spray of Porous La1-xSrxMnO3 Perovskite Coatings for SOFC Cathode Application

Sentencas: The porous LSM cathode coatings have 20-40 area % of desirable homogeneous pores determined by several processing parameters.
Titulo: Solution Precursor Plasma Spray of Porous La1-xSrxMnO3 Perovskite Coatings for SOFC Cathode Application

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction of sintered coatings shows that no suboxides of La1-xSrxMnO3 perovskite appear.
Titulo: Solution Precursor Plasma Spray of Porous La1-xSrxMnO3 Perovskite Coatings for SOFC Cathode Application

Sentencas: The results of this project indicate that the SPPS is a potential process to produce high quality cathodes for solid oxide fuel cell application.
Titulo: Solution Precursor Plasma Spray of Porous La1-xSrxMnO3 Perovskite Coatings for SOFC Cathode Application
Solution Precursor Plasma Spray of Porous La1-xSrxMnO3 Perovskite Coatings for SOFC Cathode Application
